scenario_text.value:
Hey Takuma. Glad to see it looks like you had
a good night’s rest.

And look who else is up early! Did you sleep
well, too?

She kept waking up all night, actually. Must
be her nerves.

Did you really have to go and share that,
Labramon?

If you’re feeling bad from lack of sleep,
then maybe you should talk to the othe—

That’s not necessary! I’m fine, not tired at
all.
It’s just... How do I put this?
I’m worried. What if someone gets hurt?

Maybe we should be making more detailed plans
and learning more about our opponent?

I just keep thinking, what if we set off like
this and someone gets hurt, and...

(Aoi knows this is the final fight and is
getting nervous.)

(But we don’t have many leads to act on, to
put it lightly.)

(I’m sure Aoi knows it, too. But maybe she’s
struggling with confidence.)
(What should I say to boost her confidence?)
I’ll handle it.
We’ll be fine.
No time to worry.
I’ll handle it.
I can handle this. Let me deal with it, okay?
Huh?

There’s no denying the danger, but getting
bent out of shape about it won’t help.

We have to act to seize victory and make our
hopes come true.
But, Takuma...

If anything bad happens in the process, I’ll
handle it. Trust me on that.
Takuma!

I’ll make sure no one gets hurt. You can
leave your worries to me.
Okay...

But if something does happen, WE will be the
ones to fight, not you.

Er, that’s true, but I’ll, like...do an
amazing job at staying out of your way!
Hehe... Right. That’s the spirit!

I’m sure there are things we can do, too, to
make sure no one gets hurt.
Thank you, Takuma. Let’s do all we can.
We’ll be fine.
It’s going to be okay. Don’t worry.

As long as we stick together, this is all
going to work out.
Trust me, I won’t allow anyone to get hurt.

I’ll make sure to keep everyone safe, too. So
there’s nothing to worry about!
Right... Thank you, guys.
No time to worry.

It will take courage to enter enemy
territory, but we’re out of other options.

Wasting time here might even prevent us from
making it back home.

You mean there’s no choice but to have
confidence in ourselves?

Exactly. There’s no completely safe path
moving forward.
Yeah... I guess you’re right.
If you’re awake, everyone else must be, too.

Let’s get started on breakfast, then. After
that we can head out.
